title: Science Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Applying a blended learning environment (including two face-to-face workshops) for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the scientific experiment design process with over 80% accuracy using generative AI tools.
Learners can create and interpret scientific data analysis models using generative AI tools such as ChatGPT and MidJourney.
Learners can identify and manage the scope of AI utilization in scientific report writing with over 90% accuracy while adhering to generative AI ethics guidelines.
Learners can perform generative AI-based collaborative projects in blended learning environments and suggest improvements through peer evaluation.

resources: Access to Generative AI Platform API

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
